name: Webslinger
summary: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency.
description:
Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency. This has the effects of a 2nd-level web spell using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.Traits

Anadi: Anadis are peaceful, reclusive humanoids who live deep within woodlands, jungles, and other untamed areas of wilderness. Their natural forms resemble humanoid spiders covered in beautiful and distinctive markings of varying colors.
